name: language_setValue
description: This function is used to change the language setting of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to change the language setting.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode or language to set for the device.
